meanings.definition: Make a shrill howling or wailing noise.
meanings.sent1: The stray cat was caterwauling loudly outside my window.
meanings.sent2: The wind was caterwauling through the trees on the stormy night.
meanings.sent3: The caterwauling of the baby during the flight made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The sirens caterwauling in the distance signaled an emergency.
meanings.sent5: The caterwauling of the coyotes echoed across the valley.

meanings.definition: A shrill howling or wailing noise.
meanings.sent1: The caterwauling of the sirens filled the night air.
meanings.sent2: The caterwauling of the monkeys in the zoo could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent3: The caterwauling of the alarm clock woke me up abruptly.
meanings.sent4: The caterwauling of the wind outside made the windows rattle.
meanings.sent5: The caterwauling of the seagulls by the beach was a familiar sound.
